item.title: Tincture: What is it? How to prepare and use it?
item.description: We will learn what tincture is, how to prepare it at home, and how to use it internally and externally. We also explain what plant you can use for the tincture.

item.title: What are infusions, decoction, and macerate?
item.description: Teas, aqueous extracts of medicinal plants, can be prepared differently, depending on which active ingredients the plant contains. This blog post describes the three most commonly used methods: infusions, decoction, and macerate.
